Comment: What is you actually lead with a substantive alternative and actionable vision of what a better America could look like and actually, you know, tried leading? It would work so much better than just railing on about Trump all the time.  I swear they have learned *nothing* from the last election and just seem to be doubling down on their failure.  >¬†Never before in my life have I called for mass protests, for mobilization, for disruption.  *Mass protests*, awesome. More protests in America is almost always good. Agree or disagree, I love people being passionate about their country. We have a right to protest for a reason.  *Mobilization* and *disruption* sound like thinly veiled dog whistle code words for (militant) mobilization and (societal) disruption. Is this an actual call to violence?  Not being rhetorical. This sounds like an *actual call for escalation to physical violence* and *attacks against one‚Äôs own country and countrymen* ‚Äî especially how it‚Äôs framed as being so exceptional and ‚Äúnever before have I asked.‚Äù  Calling for actual violence is in fact *treason* for a public official.¬†  At minimum this deserves clarification and an explanation.
